sect3.title: StandardAjaxFilterService
sect3.para: When serving AJAX requests made with AjaxAnywhere (see ), extracts from the initial response these page regions that need to be updated (request includes the names of these regions), then modifies the response to include just these regions (not the whole page).

row.entry: The character encoding for responses served by this filter, default being "UTF-8".

When the filter is activated, it tries to extract specified regions from response, even if they were not explicitly asked to be updated in request. This is useful for always updating some common page regions (feedback message regions etc). Some default region names that should be updated when AJAX request is made are messages, popupRegistrationRegion, scrolling.
